016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.resources;
017
018import com.eventstore.dbclient.EventStoreDBClient;
019import com.eventstore.dbclient.ReadStreamOptions;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.EventStoreService;
021import jakarta.inject.Inject;
022import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
023
024import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
025
026@Service
027public class EventStoreStreams {
028
029    private final EventStoreDBClient client;
030
031    @Inject
032    public EventStoreStreams(EventStoreService eventStoreService) {
033        client = eventStoreService.getClient();
034    }
035
036    public CompletionStage<StreamModel> getStream(String id) {
037        return client.getStreamMetadata(id).thenCombine(client.readStream(id, ReadStreamOptions.get().maxCount(1).backwards().fromEnd()),
038                (streamMetaData, readResult) ->
039                {
040                    return new StreamModel(id, readResult.getEvents().stream().findFirst().map(event -> event.getEvent().getRevision()).orElse(-1L));
041                });
042    }
043}
